task-wr.title: Preparing a Bootable USB Flash Drive on a Windows System
task-wr.shortdesc: On a Windows system, you can prepare a bootable USB flash drive using a variety of downloadable tools.

context.p: The selection of tools varies depending on your Windows version.

step.cmd: Download and install a tool designed for your version of Windows.

info.p: Use a tool that can burn media from an ISO 9660 image.

step.cmd: Follow the instructions provided with the tool.
